yo dude!emoticon_cool no one's anwsering you so i thought what the hell, i might as well try!:p 
 ok, personally i thought the oscars shouldn't have even happened this year. it shows disrespect for our troops in iraq because it sorta looks like we're forgetting them or something. i know that most people don't want to know about the war but still...

I think the Oscars were good! I mean I think we needed a little bit of escapism from the whole war thing... I know it was really freaking me out and for at least a little bit I escaped into "Oscar Land" and enjoyed it. No disrespect to the troops and all...but I did need that, and I think lots of people did too. Plus lots of them wore black to show their respect, also the pin of peace. hehe where can i get one of those?! they are awesome!!
